refrigerator: Toppings: cheese, sour cream, tomatoes, lettuce, avocado, hot sauce, etc.

sections.title: üë©‚Äçüç≥ Instructions
items: Add chicken, tomatoes, onion, taco seasoning, and broth to slow cooker.
Cook on low for 6-7 hours or high for 3-4 hours.
Shred chicken and return to slow cooker. Mix well.
Serve in taco shells with toppings.
